short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy and paste full patient records between popular practice management and scheduling apps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No more time wasted on duplicate data entry. Supports two-way copy+paste between Eyefinity PM, AcuityLogic and Eppointments (TAB). Unlimited use of Free version. Upgrades to support more websites and features coming soon.
